humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Metastatic carcinoma in one of eight lymph nodes (1/8)', which indicates that one out of eight lymph nodes has metastatic carcinoma. According to the new rule 12, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes, which matches the finding in this report. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in one of eight lymph nodes examined (1/8), which indicates N1 stage. This is based on the TNM staging system for cancer, where N1 means that cancer has spread to 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes or to internal mammary lymph nodes with or without axillary lymph node involvement.
